Content: Executive Board of the International Monetary Fund has completed the fourth review of Sri Lanka’s economic performance under the program supported by a three-year Extended Arrangement under the Extended Fund Facility (EFF) arrangement. The IMF said that the completion of this review enables the disbursement of about US $ 252 million, bringing total disbursements under the arrangement to the equivalent of about US$ 1,014 million. Sri Lanka’s three-year extended arrangement was approved on June 3, 2016, in the amount of about US $1.5 billion.
